// components/Dashboard.js import React from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; const Dashboard = () => { // Accessing data from the Redux store const invoices = useSelector((state) => state.data.invoices); const products = useSelector((state) => state.data.products); const customers = useSelector((state) => state.data.customers); return (

Invoices

{invoices.map((invoice, index) => ( ))}
Invoice ID Amount Date
{invoice.id} {invoice.amount} {invoice.date}

Products

{products.map((product, index) => ( ))}
Product ID Name Price
{product.id} {product.name} {product.price}

Customers

{customers.map((customer, index) => ( ))}
Customer ID Name
{customer.id} {customer.name}
); }; export default Dashboard;
